blog1Title: Welcome to the Salty Karma family.
blog1Description: It's finally here! The official website of the Salty Karma studio, where you'll regularly find blogs on a variety of subjects, including DevBlogs on the studio's next project, which will be announced very soon!
blog2Title: How did I learn to make video games?
blog2Description: Do you dream of making your own video games? Would you like to learn how to code or use software such as Unity, but don't know where to start?
